mapper.select: select fbm_num,fbm_title,fbm_content,fbm_category,fbm_date,m_nickname,fbm_hit,m_id from free_board_member join member using(m_id)
select fbs_num,fbs_title,fbs_content,fbs_category,fbs_date,fbs_hit,fm_id from free_board_seller join fmanager using(fm_id)
select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_category,nb_date,m_nickname,nb_hit,m_id from nori_board join member using(m_id)
select n_num,n_title,n_content,to_char(n_date ,'yyyy-mm-dd') n_date,n_hit,a_id from notice_board join admin using(a_id)
select q_num,q_title,to_char(q_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') q_date,q_status,m_nickname from q_board q, member m where q.member_id = m.m_id and q_member = 'member'
select q_num,q_title,to_char(q_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') q_date,q_status,fm_name from q_board q, fmanager m where q.member_id = m.fm_id and q_member = 'seller'

select eb_num,eb_title,fm_name,finfo_name,to_char(eb_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') eb_date,to_char(eb_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') eb_start_date,to_char(eb_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') eb_end_date,eb_hit,img_name from event_board join event_board_images using (eb_num) join fmanager using(fm_id) order by eb_num desc

select * from( select rownum rnum,b.* from(select eb_num,eb_title,fm_name,finfo_name,to_char(eb_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') eb_date,to_char(eb_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') eb_start_date,to_char(eb_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') eb_end_date,eb_hit,img_name from event_board join event_board_images using (eb_num) join fmanager using(fm_id) order by eb_num desc)b) where rnum between 1 and 3
select * from( select rownum rnum,b.* from( select n_num,n_title,n_content,to_char(n_date ,'yyyy-mm-dd') n_date,n_hit,a_id from notice_board join admin using(a_id))b) where rnum between 1 and 3
